company.name: Pryxida TECH
company.description:
ENGINEERING SERVICES FOR RISK MANAGEMENT
Pryxida TECH offers its clients engineering services and risk management, using tools from Chemical Process Safety, Physical Asset Integrity Management, Operational Reliability and Emergency Management, through the identification of threats, hazards and analysis of risks, integrity of equipment and structures, security instrumented systems, detection and alarm systems (F & G), fire extinguishing systems, obsolescence studies, estimation of equipment remaining life, elaboration and updating of plans for contingency, management of emergencies and evacuation.
We place at the disposal of our clients, a team composed of highly qualified professionals, with a wide and practical vision of the interactions of the systems, to develop an optimized interdisciplinary solution that knows no technical boundaries. Our group of engineers has extensive professional experience in the various stages of the life cycle of Physical Assets in Colombia and abroad; and in the proposal of control and mitigation measures for the management of technological risk towards the social-environmental environment and the care of the reputation of the companies.
